title: Marinated sundried tomato salad
ingredients: ['Part one', '1 (80g) jar sundried tomatoes (not in oil)', '80g (large bunch) of fresh basil, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced or pressed', '200ml olive oil', '125ml balsamic vinegar', 'Part Two', '1 (500g) punnet cherry tomatoes, sliced in half', '100g toasted pine nuts', '1 bunch spring onions, chopped']
